name: Lucky Coin
description:
Test your luck with multiple funny games!

Press > to play games (Coin Flip is the only game implemented at this stage of development)

Press < to go back to shop!

COIN FLIP
  • Use the slider to choose how much you want to bid! (minimum bid is 20% of your current balance)
  • Click the Arrow to choose what side you think the coin is gonna land on!
  • Click the Coin to flip!!!!! 
  • FUN!!!!1
SHOP
  • Hover over items to see what they do!
  • Double click to purchase!
  • Click on the yellow man to buy a Lottery Ticket! (not implemented yet)
  • Low on cash??? Maybe rummaging through the Garbage can get you a quick buck!
